_source.title: 24 Hour Moving Average Response Times
_source.visState: {"title":"24 Hour Moving Average Response Times","type":"timelion","params":{"expression":".es(index={{ FireDepartment.es_indices.fire-incident }}, metric=avg:description.extended_data.response_duration).movingaverage(24).color(darkgreen).label(\"24 hour moving average\"), .es(index={{ FireDepartment.es_indices.fire-incident }}, metric=avg:description.extended_data.response_duration).points(fill=5).color(lightgreen).label(\"Average response time\")","interval":"auto"},"aggs":[],"listeners":{}}
